original_text: Of Merari was the family of the Mahlites, and the family of the Mushites: these are the families of Merari.
korean_text: 므라리에게서는 말리 종족과 무시 종족이 났으니 이들은 곧 므라리 종족들이라

sentences.original_text: Of Merari was the family of the Mahlites
and the family of the Mushites
these are the families of Merari
